description_txt: stated on February 14, 2020 in a TV interview:
quote_txt: Says the Affordable Care Act “took money out of the Medicare trust fund.”

description_txt: stated on February 20, 2020 in an image:
quote_txt: “Bernie Sanders wants free health care for all and was asked how he would pay for it. His answer was raise taxes to 52% on anybody making over $29,000 per year.”

description_txt: stated on February 19, 2020 in a debate:
quote_txt: "Amy, I looked online at your (health care) plan. It’s two paragraphs."

description_txt: stated on February 16, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says President Trump’s limousine driver did burnouts to entertain Daytona 500 spectators during a rain delay.

description_txt: stated on February 8, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says image shows Pete Buttigieg in a leather suit posing with two other men.

description_txt: stated on January 26, 2020 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "@BernieSanders receives strong support from the conservative & most rural part of Vermont."

description_txt: stated on February 19, 2020 in a State of the State Address:
quote_txt: "Back in 2005, when we did that first point-in-time count, there were over 188,000 thousand people that were deemed homeless in the state of California. … That’s 35,000 more than we have today.”

description_txt: stated on February 13, 2020 in a rally:
quote_txt: Says “black babies die at rates twice as high as white babies because of a lack of access to affordable health care.”

description_txt: stated on February 20, 2020 in an MSNBC interview:
quote_txt: “The majority of hunters now want universal background checks, the majority of Trump voters.”

description_txt: stated on February 20, 2020 in a tweeted video:
quote_txt: Video shows Democratic presidential candidates speechless for 20 seconds when discussing whether any of them started a business.

description_txt: stated on February 20, 2020 in a story:
quote_txt: Says the United Nations plans to “implant everyone with a biometric ID.”

description_txt: stated on February 20, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Maxine Waters tweeted, “Every single gun owner I have talked to has told me, ‘As soon as I walked out of that gun store, I felt a killer growing inside of me.’ When will we acknowledge there is no such thing as a responsible gun owner?”

description_txt: stated on February 19, 2020 in the Democratic debate in Nevada:
quote_txt: The budget hole in Bernie Sanders’ plans “is bigger than the size of the entire economy of the United States."

description_txt: stated on February 11, 2020 in a speech to the American Medical Association:
quote_txt: "Yet, for all that spending, health outcomes today on Medicaid are mediocre and many patients have difficulty accessing care.”

description_txt: stated on January 16, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says if you take the oath of office on the Koran, “then you have committed treason.”

description_txt: stated on February 13, 2020 in the GOP weekly radio address:
quote_txt: “Violent crime rates increased in all but two Wisconsin cities between 2008 and 2017.”

description_txt: stated on February 13, 2020 in a tweet:
quote_txt: Says a photo shows the height difference between Donald Trump and Mike Bloomberg.

description_txt: stated on February 9, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: “Starbucks CEO Has Admitted She Doesnt Like White People”

description_txt: stated on February 20, 2020 in a blog post:

description_txt: stated on February 17, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says a photo shows an elephant carrying a lion cub to a pool of water so it wouldn’t die.

description_txt: stated on January 30, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says a photo shows Ilhan Omar without a head scarf.

description_txt: stated on February 9, 2020 in a story:
quote_txt: Says Melania Trump lied under oath in 2013 about graduating from college with a bachelor’s degree in architecture.

description_txt: stated on February 19, 2020 in the Las Vegas debate:
quote_txt: “Mayor Bloomberg was busy blaming African Americans and Latinos for the housing crisis in 2008.”

description_txt: stated on February 19, 2020 in comments during the February Democratic primary debate in Las Vegas:
quote_txt: “From the moment we passed that signature legislation, Mike (Bloomberg) called it a disgrace.”

description_txt: stated on February 19, 2020 in a Democratic presidential primary debate in Las Vegas:
quote_txt: “When we discovered, I discovered, that we were doing many, many, too many stop and frisks, we cut 95% of it out.”

description_txt: stated on February 7, 2020 in campaign talking points issued days before the New Hampshire primary:

description_txt: stated on February 12, 2020 in a Facebook post:
